about_the_game:
Fear comes from accidental situations.

Let Camilla get out of her sudden changed terror and back to her family's side.
Sometimes run wild, sometimes use ideas

She wants to go back to her happy daily life with her family

- Get the target value goods needed to clear each stage
- Get all the goods and move on to the next stage, avoiding monsters that hinder the acquisition of goods
- Items that can be found in between will help you avoid monsters.

Clear the step-by-step stage to reach the final ending.

[How to play]

moving: WASD
Jump: Shift
Interaction: E
Backflip: F

[Play time]
30 minutes to an hour

setting options provide screen adjustment, sound-related adjustment options.
This game supports Korean, English, and Japanese.

[Stage 1 will be provided in the demo version, and all stages will be provided in the official version]

name: Camilla(カミラ) Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Window 10, 11
  • Processor: inter Core i7 4770
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Let Camilla return to her family's side, free from the sudden change in terror. Please check the acquired goods for clear by each stage and reach the clear goal.
